Smart Power Strip: Create a power strip with built-in Wi-Fi connectivity and a smartphone app that allows users to control and monitor their devices remotely. This smart power strip can detect when a device is not in use and automatically turn it off to save energy.

Multi-Port Power Strip with USB-C Charging: Design a power strip with multiple USB ports and a single USB-C charging port. This power strip can charge multiple devices at once and also charge a USB-C device at the fastest possible speed.

Power Strip with Built-In Surge Protector: Develop a power strip with a built-in surge protector that can protect devices from power surges and spikes. This power strip can also have a LED indicator that shows the level of protection it provides.

Adjustable Power Strip: Create a power strip with adjustable outlets that can be moved up or down depending on the user's needs. This power strip can be especially useful for people who have different devices with different plug sizes.

Power Strip with Integrated Cable Management: Design a power strip with built-in cable management features, such as cable ties or a built-in cable organizer. This power strip can help keep cables organized and untangled, making it easier to use and maintain.
